events.message: I recently ordered a jacket but want to request a full refund because the size I received is incorrect and I no longer want to keep it.
The customer's request mentions refund and return due to order issue, categorizing the case under Refund cluster.
Assigning the case to refund specialist team for further handling of the customer's refund request.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you'd like a refund for your jacket due to incorrect size received.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in original packaging for processing the refund?
My order number is 987654321. The jacket is unworn and still in the original packaging, ready to be returned.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund as soon as we receive the returned jacket and email you a return label shortly.
That sounds good, I appreciate your prompt help and look forward to receiving the return shipping label soon.
The return label has been sent to your email. Please send back the jacket at your convenience to complete the refund process.
Just checking in to confirm if you have received the return label and if you need any assistance with the return process.
Yes, I received the label and have already shipped the jacket back. Thank you for your support.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your full refund. You should see the credit on your card shortly.
Your refund case is now closed. Please contact us if you have any further questions or need assistance.
We have sent a short survey to gather your feedback on our refund process and customer support experience.
